satnav.model

Class Junction

  • java.lang.Object
    • satnav.model.Junction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    State

    public class Junction
extends java.lang.Object
implements State
    A Junction is an geographic state/location in a road map. This State has a set of possible actions (outgoing roads to other junctions).
    Author:
    Simon Campbell

      • isNeigbourTo

        public boolean isNeigbourTo(Junction nextJunction)
        The method checks whether a given junction neighbours this junction (i.e. it is the terminal junction on an outgoing road from this)
        Parameters:
        nextJunction - - the destination junction to check
        Returns:
        true iff the nextJunction is he terminal junction on an outgoing road from this
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if nextJunction is null

      • distanceToNeighbour

        public int distanceToNeighbour(Junction neighbouringJunction)
        This method returns the distance to the given neighbouring Junction.
        Parameters:
        neighbouringJunction - - the neighbouring junction whose distance along the outgoing road we require
        Returns:
        the length of the outgoing road to the given neigbouring junction. If the Junction is not a neigbour we return Integer.MAX_VALUE
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - on null input
